message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a novel method for scene text detection using instance segmentation, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The method involves predicting text center-border probability and text center-direction, which can be seen as a machine learning problem (cs.AI, cs.LG). The paper also discusses the robustness of the method to multi-oriented and curved text, which relates to information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL).
